fullDescription.intro: This node downloads images from the MNIST dataset and supplies them in the output table.
fullDescription.option: Whether to binarize the images. Meaning the pixel values will be binary.
Whether to fetch images from the MNIST test or MNIST training dataset. The training dataset contains 60000 images and the test dataset 10000 images.
How many images should be fetched by the node.

ports.outPort: Data table containing the specified number of MNIST train or test images.
